# glm.deploy

Generates the source code of the scoring algorithm (predict) of a GLM object to C or JAVA to deploy/operationalize it outside R.

## Output options
At this stage output source code availables are: C and Java.

## Link Function Compatibility
The link functions compatible are: identity, probit, cloglog, log, sqrt, inverse, 1/mu^2, logit

## Example

This is a basic example with the iris dataset to create a glm object and pass it to the two functions glm2c and glm2java:

```{r example}
## basic example code
  data(iris)
  iristest = iris
  iristest$Virginica = ifelse(iristest$Species == 'virginica', TRUE,FALSE)
  iristest$Species = NULL
  model <- glm(Virginica ~ ., family = binomial(logit), data=iristest)
  glm2c(model)
  glm2java(model)
```
